page.title: 08Karate Club
page.content: At our school at 7.00 p.m my dad and his friend run a karate club which anybody can join. There are two sessions. The children train for one hour and the seniors for the next two. Karate is on Tuesdays and Thursdays. You have to remember the 'Oath' which is a promise not to use karate when not necessary. There are different belts to get and for each you have to take a grading. There are seven belts which are:- yellow, orange, green, blue, purple, brown and black. My dad is a black belt 2nd Dan and I am a purple belt. To get into karate club you pay 50 pence every week you come. There are eight basic moves you have to learn which are quite easy when you know them. There are eight Dans in the black belt. My Dad is one. Sometimes we do demonstrations for people at different schools.
